# hash(into:)

**Instance Method**

Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

## Declaration

```swift
func hash(into hasher: inout Hasher)
```

## Parameters

- **hasher**: The hasher to use when combining the components of this instance.

## Describing a Set

- **description**: A string that represents the contents of the set.
- **debugDescription**: A string that represents the contents of the set, suitable for debugging.
- **customMirror**: A mirror that reflects the set.
